name: Farmers National Banc Corp.
description: Farmers National Banc Corp. is a diversified financial holding company headquartered in Canfield, Ohio. Established in 1887, the company primarily operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Farmers National Bank, which provides a full range of banking services including retail and commercial banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management. Farmers National Banc Corp. focuses on delivering exceptional customer service while leveraging technology to enhance the banking experience. The bank is known for its community involvement and commitment to supporting local businesses and residents. In addition to traditional banking services, Farmers offers investment management, trust services, and insurance products, making it a one-stop financial institution for its customers. The company has a strong emphasis on maintaining a sound financial position and strategic growth through acquisitions and organic development. With a growing network of branches across northeastern Ohio, Farmers National Banc Corp. aims to continue expanding its footprint and enhancing shareholder value through prudent financial management and customer-focused initiatives. The company's mission is to provide personalized service and innovative financial solutions that meet the evolving needs of its customers, while also contributing positively to the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Farmers National Banc Corp. | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Farmers National Banc Corp., a leading provider of banking and financial services in Ohio. Discover our commitment to customer service and community support.

faq.question: What services does Farmers National Bank offer?
faq.answer: Farmers National Bank offers personal banking, business banking, mortgage loans, investment management, trust services, and insurance products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Farmers National Banc Corp.?
faq.answer: Kevin J. Helmick is the CEO of Farmers National Banc Corp.

faq.question: Where is Farmers National Banc Corp. headquartered?
faq.answer: Farmers National Banc Corp. is headquartered in Canfield, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: When was Farmers National Banc Corp. founded?
faq.answer: Farmers National Banc Corp. was founded in 1887.
